statements: UPDATE currency_balances SET usd_balance = 100.25, eur_balance = 50.75 WHERE user_id = 'b5fb6122-3d0c-4d4d-bc50-d2b6c611a54b';

UPDATE user_currency_balances SET USD_balance = 500.25, EUR_balance = 300.50 WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE currency_exchange_rates SET exchange_rate = 1.25 WHERE currency_pair = 'USD_EUR';
UPDATE user_currency_balances SET EUR_balance = EUR_balance + 100, BTC_balance = BTC_balance - 0.005 WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE currency_exchange_rates SET exchange_rate = 1.2 WHERE currency_pair = 'EUR-USD';
UPDATE currency_balances SET balance_usd = 1000.50, balance_eur = 500.75 WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 50.25, timestamp = '2022-03-15 10:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 98765;
UPDATE currency_balances SET balance_usd = balance_usd + 100.50, balance_eur = balance_eur - 50.75 WHERE user_id = 1000;
UPDATE users SET username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = 500;
UPDATE user_balances SET USD_balance = 1200.50, EUR_balance = 900.75 WHERE user_id = 12345

UPDATE user_balances SET USD_balance = USD_balance + 100.50, EUR_balance = EUR_balance - 50.25 WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = amount * 1.1, transaction_date = NOW() WHERE user_id = 54321 AND currency_type = 'USD';

UPDATE user_info SET first_name = 'John', email = 'john@example.com' WHERE user_id = 54321;
